resources.string:
"🍇 Greetings, Fruit Picker! 🌟
Ready to embark on a juicy adventure in the world of Seven Fruits? 🎮
Grant us access to your Advertising ID. Unlock personalized challenges and embark on fruitful quests! Accept to reveal exclusive rewards and let the sweet flavors of adventure flourish. 🍓🍊🍏"
